title: Match problem
body: So I was going to play some AR URF but when I accepted the match it didn't do anything, I figured someone denied it but it stayed on that screen for a good two minutes. After that I got into the champion screen but with the timer at 0 and the chat saying connecting... I had to exit the client just so I could leave. I hope this doesn't give me any punishments.

replies.body: Your network might have been having a hard time transitioning you into that game lobby for whatever reason. Let's take a step back and troubleshoot a bit by using our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Be sure to follow each step, but also pay close attention to how to flush your DNS. Let me know how that helps!
